column4: Hey guys I've got an issue i cant figure out. when ever i close the screen on my laptop I get an error saying "Ubuntu is running in low-graphics mode  Your screen, graphics card, and input devices could not be detected correctly. You will need to configure these yourself" it doesnt do this on starup and I dont have alot of crazy compiz graphics active either. Can someone knowledgeable help me with this?
is your computer suspending when you close the laptop lid?
no i have it set to blank screen
